definition: to encapsulate/to enclose/to wrap/to seal inside
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
ball grid array (BGA), type of microchip package
pinyin: qiu2 shan1 zhen4 lie4 feng1 zhuang1

sentences.english: Can no multidisc games be put in a package with this?
sentences.chinese: 單碟遊戲能否像這樣封裝在一起？

sentences.english: The F14 offers compact package dimensions and a pluggable pin header.
sentences.chinese: 在女性14例提供了緊湊的封裝尺寸和可插入針。

sentences.english: The generator represents magnetron, packaged with constants and electromagnets(2 coils magnetic) in the magnetic-shielded ceramic-metal execution.
sentences.chinese: 該磁控管的設計採用電磁石，封裝採用金屬陶瓷。

sentences.english: The company ' s primary business is IC component packaging and test and memory module assembly.
sentences.chinese: 公司的主要業務是集成電路封裝測試和內存模塊裝配。

sentences.english: Farhana : You mean, Encapsulation, Inheritance, and Polymorphism, right?
sentences.chinese: 你是說封裝，繼承，多態對嗎？

sentences.english: The init wrapper is now in place.
sentences.chinese: 現在初始化封裝器安裝在正確的地方了。

sentences.english: Achieving the right amount of encapsulation and cohesion is still an art.
sentences.chinese: 達到合適的封裝性和內聚性仍然是一門藝術。

sentences.english: Firewalls allow for enforcement of the domain encapsulation.
sentences.chinese: 防火牆允許增強對域的封裝。

sentences.english: The 3-D finite element model is built for the modal analysis of board-level package.
sentences.chinese: 建立了板級封裝的三維有限元模型並進行模態分析。

sentences.english: Here's how we get the init wrapper installed.
sentences.chinese: 下面是我們如何安裝初始化封裝器。

sentences.english: This paper discusses a true wafer level packaging (WLP) technology which is called Ultra CSPTM.
sentences.chinese: 文章論述了超CSPTM圓片級封裝技術工藝。

sentences.english: The Tea-bag Packing Machine model SD-DPC-81 have added automatic boxing device instead of envelope packing system.
sentences.chinese: 型包裝機減掉了外袋封裝機構，增加了自動入盒裝置。

sentences.english: That's just good encapsulation and smart layering.
sentences.chinese: 那正是很好的封裝和智能分層方式。

sentences.english: A closed bottle can be kept for more than 100 years and you’ll still be good to go.
sentences.chinese: 封裝好的威士忌能存放100年並保持原有的香醇。

sentences.english: HDLC specifies a data encapsulation method on synchronous serial links using frame characters and checksums.
sentences.chinese: 使幀特性幀校驗序連接指種數據封裝。

pinyin: dian4 nao3 fu3 zhu4 she4 ji4

definition: computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)
